Grid System

Autosizing

Building a grid system is very simple!

  1. Add a grid wrapper
    <div class="grid-wrapper"><!-- cells here --></div>
  2. Add as many cell elements as you want
    <div class="grid-cell"><!-- content here --></div>
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell

Cell Sizes

You can change the number of grids (default is 5).

  1. Add a grid wrapper
  2. Add a cell element with prefixed-size
  3. Add as many cell elements as you want
.grid-cell .cell--1of5
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell
.grid-cell .cell--1of5
.grid-cell
.grid-cell

Code



.cell--1of5


.grid-cell 


.grid-cell
